title: Multi-Agent Spec - Agent Definition
description: Schema for defining an AI agent in a multi-agent system

name.description: Unique identifier for the agent (lowercase, hyphenated)

description.description: Brief description of the agent's purpose and capabilities

model.description: Model capability tier (mapped to platform-specific models)

tools.description: List of tools the agent can use

skills.description: List of skills the agent can invoke

dependencies.description: Other agents this agent depends on or can spawn

instructions.description: System prompt / instructions for the agent

tool.description: Canonical tool name (mapped to platform-specific names)
